title: Burrow vs. Lawrence; Brady vs. Belichick; Calvin Johnson; Adrian Amos
itunes:title: Burrow vs. Lawrence; Brady vs. Belichick; Calvin Johnson; Adrian Amos
description:
In the latest edition of the Good Morning Football Podcast, hosts Kay Adams, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager, and Matt Cassel dive into the Thursday Night Football matchup between the previous two #1 overall picks, Trevor Lawrence and Joe Burrow. Then they get into mixed bag trivia featuring #1 overall picks; Brady vs. Belichick; and lastly, they are joined by Adrian Amos from the Packers to share how Aaron Rodgers has been in the locker-room and Hall of Fame receiver, Calvin Johnson to share how what it was like to be honored in Detroit and what he thinks of Matthew Stafford and the Los Angeles Rams.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
